song.title: Pizza Forever
song.info:
lyircs are like this (they do not make much sense anyway):
spaghetti maccaroni mortadella tortellini mozzarella stracciatella buona sera buona note
sei tutto per me sono pazzo di te entra nella mia vita oh my pizza margherita
I still feel so high above when I first saw you I fell deep in love when I first saw you I had the proof my feelings all went through the highest roof
the people around me they all see it too because all I think and do is just for you
spaghetti maccaroni mortadella tortellini mozzarella stracciatella buona sera buona note
sei tutto per me sono pazzo di te entra nella mia vita oh my pizza margherita
from the start you taste very good I can't get enough of you you are my favorite food you are the best thing in the world you have been built just for us NERDS I can eat you every night and day you are so awesome in every single way
spaghetti maccaroni mortadella tortellini mozzarella stracciatella buona sera buona note
